summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 8th Avenue South, from Director Street to the south City Limits, being the south line of Excelsior Acre Tracts; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9710 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
